Author: neuromantiska
Text: To me it didn't increase my appetite and that's was something that bugged me, how did i gain weight eating the same? but yeah, the estrogen and boobs growth was what made me paranoid. and I can't stop the pills cause my cysts could grow and burst :(

Author: scarletfawn
Text: I don't have experience with birth control pills myself but I know a lot of people who do and most of them have gained some weight after starting to take them. Some say it increases appetite but the pill also messes with one's hormones in general and due to the estrogen it's kinda normal for your boobs to grow/for you to get curvier.
